This animation shows the types hurricane wind damage. Dorian is a Category 5 w/ 185 winds. Catastrophic damage is expected in its path. Most of the area will be uninhabitable for weeks-months.

A Hurricane Warning has been issued from Jupiter Inlet to the Volusia/Brevard line. A Hurricane Watch remains in effect from Deerfield Beach to Jupiter and has been added from the Brevard/Volusia line to the Volusia/Flagler line. #Dorian #DorianFlorida

Category 5 Hurricane Dorian is now churning through the Bahamas. Winds are up to 185mph. The east coast of Florida north of Miami is now under Hurricane Watches and Warnings. Storm surge of several feet, flooding rain, and catastrophic damaging wind forecast to start late Monday.
